name: Leo Source
subtitle: A source for all of my apps
description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find all of my apps.

apps.name: YouTube
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This lets you add your own audio files to your videos.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: YouTube needs bluetooth access to scan for nearby Cast devices.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you create videos using the app.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be sent to YouTube servers to help you find friends to share videos with.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Access to your network allows YouTube to discover and connect to devices such as your TV.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Makes it easier for you to attach location information to your videos and live streams and allows for features such as improved recommendations and ads.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you include audio with your videos and search using your voice.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you upload media you've already created.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: To personalize ads and provide ad measurement, YouTube will link activity from this app with activity from non-Google apps and websites.

apps.name: Spotify
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This will let you play your imported music on Spotify.
privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This lets you unlock new ways of interacting with other devices compatible with Spotify via Bluetooth.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This lets you scan Spotify Codes.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This lets you set access restrictions using Face ID.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Spotify will use HealthKit data to provide personalised audio recommendations for your workouts.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This lets you listen on different devices. Spotify will also get access to local audio files.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This lets you control Spotify using your voice.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: We will use this to understand which audio motivates you most.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This lets you save images to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This lets you select images from your Photo Library.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to deliver personalized ads or content to you.

apps.name: RoGold
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

apps.name: QuestionAI
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: You can use the camera to recognize questions, as well as mathematical, physical, and other formulas.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Allows us to generate more accurate answers based on questions from people nearby.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: In order to improve the accuracy of questioning and AI assistant, it is necessary to enable microphone permission. Failure to do so will not affect your ability to use the intelligent assistant's functions
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: You can upload images to recognize questions, as well as mathematical, physical, and other formulas.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: You can upload images to recognize questions, as well as mathematical, physical, and other formulas.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: HelpÂ QuestionAIÂ access IDFA tracking permission for improved services and personalized experience. This permission is only for device identification and can be turned off in Settings-Privacy.

apps.name: PicsArt
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: We would like access to bluetooth for peripheral accessories.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: We would like access to the calendar so we can serve you more relevant content.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be uploaded to Picsartâs server to help you and others find friends!

apps.name: TikTok
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: To select sound from your library, allow us to access your Apple Music.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Add events to your device calendar to get reminders when events start.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: You'll be able to record video.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Sync your contacts to easily find people you know on TikTok. Your contacts will only be used to help you connect with friends.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: The TikTok app will be able to discover and connect with devices that have the TikTok app installed for camera and screen sharing.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: If location services are enabled, TikTok will collect, store and use your device's approximate location to improve your experience.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: To record audio, allow us to access your Microphone.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: To upload from or download to your device, allow access to your photos in your phone settings.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: To upload from or download to your device, allow access to your photos in your phone settings.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This allows TikTok to provide you with a better ads experience.

apps.name: Minecraft
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: When you use the Xbox Live Friend Finder, it will access your contacts to help you find your friends.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Minecraft wants to access your local network. This allows you and others on your local network to play together. Declining this permission does not affect online features or gameplay. But will prevent you and others, on the same network, from playing together.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Used to read and write Minecraft images.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Used to read and write Minecraft images.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to track advertising efficiency.

apps.name: Duolingo
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Take a photo to use for your Duolingo profile.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: Your contacts will be securely uploaded to Duolingo to help you find friends.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Duolingo uses your current location to find nearby events.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Speaking is essential to language learning.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: In order to save screenshots of exercises like this one.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Find an existing photo to use for your Duolingo profile.
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Speaking is essential to language learning.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This will be used to show ads relevant to you.

apps.name: Discord
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: By allowing access to your camera, you can take pictures and others will be able to see you in voice and video calls.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: We can help you find people you know on Discord. Your contacts will be regularly sent to us so you can connect with friends. You can turn this off any time.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Allow Discord access to your local network to find devices using the same internet connection.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: To enable services that require location
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: To enable services that require location
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: To enable services that require location
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: By allowing access to your microphone, you'll be able to talk in calls.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: By allowing access to your library, you'll be able to download photos and videos.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: By allowing us access to your photos, you will be able to upload images as an avatar, server icon, and more, and you can send photos and videos to your friends and communities.

apps.name: CapCut
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: CapCut requires permission to import and add music from Apple's media library to video editing project files.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: CapCut requires permission to use the camera to capture photos and videos for video editing, saving, publishing.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: CapCut requires permission to access your microphone to record sounds for video editing, saving, publishing.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: CapCut requires access to the album to import photos and videos to video editing project files and save videos to the device.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: CapCut requires access to UserTracking to identify the device for managing data statistics, analyzing service effects, ensuring service security and improving user experience.Please rest assured that opening the permission will not obtain your private information on other sites.

apps.name: Alarm
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: Bluetooth is used to provide you with relevant ads.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Alarm Clock for Me can provide you with weather forecast for your exact location.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Alarm Clock for Me requires camera access to use flashlight only. Your privacy is our most concern.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver personalized ads to you.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: To get accurate location to provide relevant ads
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: Bluetooth is used to provide you with relevant ads.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Please allow Alarm Clock for Me access to Camera Roll to be able to import your photos.
privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: Alarm Clock for Me requires Apple Music to change alarm sounds
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Calendar is used to provide you with relevant ads.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Alarm Clock for Me can provide you with weather forecast for your exact location.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Please allow Alarm Clock for Me access to Camera Roll to be able to import your photos.
